topic: How can I add new elements to an Array in Javascript?
description: I am working in a university project and I need to add more elements to Array Objects
answers: Hi!, you can use push() method to add the element at the end of the array

topic: How can I get the index value in a loop?
description: I have a for loop and I need to know the index of the iterated elements

topic: How I can I build a HTML Template
description: I have heard templates help to create dinamic sites, can you help me with that?
answers: Hello, You can use the template tag and render the content inside of it afterwards with javascript

topic: How can I get data from a JSON File in Javascript?
description: I have a large amount of Data in JSON file format, how can I get the Data in Javascript?s
answers: Hi, I would use the Fetch() method, that returns a Promise and after that you will get a Response object
